Description: My start in the field was with Yallakora. It was necessary and taught me a lot, so it was one of the most essential steps in mycareer
Moving to 365 Scores was a big and important step for me, and I benefited a lot from it. I was satisfied with working with them, but this period did not last long due to my high schoo

After I finished high school, there was a big challenge for me to regain my level again, and my work with Corner was what helped me most with that, with a good work environment. Working with them was the reason for my return
In fact, all of these steps would not have succeeded if I had not worked and developed myself continuously, so my freelance work is one of the most important reasons for my continuity and creativity

My work with SportFive was truly a dream for me, and this was the biggest step in my career. This came after a lot of work, but it came true. It may be the most satisfactory period for me in my career so far, with quality, professionalism, and an excellent work environment. They are truly the best
